bill_title: allow law enforcement officials to use new technological advances in lie detection.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to allow law enforcement officials to use new technological advances in lie detection. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 36-30 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: This chapter does not apply to any law enforcement official if that person is acting in the capacity of a law enforcement official. 450 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
